posts.post_content:
It presents nicely for a "1" and is only graded that way because someone used an embossing stamper on it, like you sometimes see inside library books. Cool card.

$SOLD, shipping in the conus included, payment via PayPal "friends and family", personal/bank check, money order.

Commitment to purchase outweighs any messages/inquiries.  :rolleyes:

Please send a PM if interested.
Karthik! I’ll take this. Will email you now.
